TopicTitle: Mod for kerbals to move to point?

Articles.Content: Is there a mod that can tell a Kerbal to run to a specified point? For example, I don't have a rover and I want Jedediah Kerman to run to his spaceship, which is on the other side of a crater on the Mun. It would take forever for me to make him run over there, so is there a mod that can make him run automatically and let me do other things?

EVA Follower allows you to move multiple kerbals at once, as well as set patrols, so you could probably set tell the kerbal to go "patrol" the ship. Keep in mind the kerbal must be in the physics range, so as long as "let me do other things" means making a sandwich or muting KSP and watching some videos, then yes there is a mod for you. There is a patched version linked on the last page of the thread that should work in 1.0.4, but no promises.
most people just point them in the general direction and put something heavy on the forward and run keys
